channel.title: Time Out Singapore RSS API - Events
channel.description: RSS Feed from Time Out Singapore's Events

item.title: Manga Drawing
item.description: Sat 04 Sep - An interactive workshop for hardcore anime and manga fans. The course covers basic drawing techniques and gives the oppportunity to create an original character. Workshop suitable for adults, and children above 12.

item.title: Yellow River Cantata
item.description: Sat 18 Sep - The moving Yellow River Cantata is performed by a top national conductor from China, Cao Ding, with a 300-strong choir, made up of eight choral groups from Singapore and Malaysia. The Braddell Heights Symphony Orchestra accompanies.

item.title: A Bridge Of Silk: Asian A Cappella
item.description: 18-19 Sep - The Philharmonic Chamber Choir, conducted by Lim Yau, celebrates Asian a cappella music from folk-song settings such as Takemitsu’s ‘Sakura’ to Feliciano’s ‘Pokpok Alimpako’.
